Kathmandu.title: Kathmandu sightseeing tour
Kathmandu.description: A full‑day guided tour of Kathmandu’s UNESCO World Heritage Sites including Boudhanath, Swayambhunath, Pashupatinath, Patan and Bhaktapur Durbar Squares.

Kathmandu.title: Boudhanath Stupa
Kathmandu.description: Visit the iconic Buddhist stupa and cultural center of Boudhanath.

Kathmandu.title: Pashupatinath Temple
Kathmandu.description: Explore one of the most sacred Hindu temples in South Asia on the Bagmati River banks.

Kathmandu.title: Swayambhunath Temple
Kathmandu.description: The hilltop Monkey Temple offering views over Kathmandu valley and rich Buddhist heritage.

Kathmandu.title: Patan Durbar Square
Kathmandu.description: Stroll through the royal palaces and temples of Patan Durbar Square, noted for Newari architecture.

Kathmandu.title: Bhaktapur Durbar Square
Kathmandu.description: Discover two ancient Newar cities’ royal squares and temples.

Kathmandu.title: Chandragiri Cable Car Tour in Kathmandu
Kathmandu.description: Ride the Chandragiri hill cable car for panoramic views of Nepal’s Himalaya.

Kathmandu.title: Dhulikhel, Namobuddha & Panauti – A Scenic Day Tour from Kathmandu
Kathmandu.description: Visit historic towns and Buddhist pilgrimage sites near the Kathmandu valley.

Kathmandu.title: Shivapuri National Park
Kathmandu.description: Nature hikes through Shivapuri National Park overlooking Kathmandu city.

Kathmandu.title: Nagarkot Tour
Kathmandu.description: Sunrise and mountain-view tour at the tranquil Nagarkot hill station.

Kathmandu.title: Nagarkot Sunrise Tour
Kathmandu.description: Drive to Nagarkot for sunrise views across the Himalayas.

Kathmandu.title: Nagarkot Hiking Trail
Kathmandu.description: Hiking trail up and around Nagarkot with panoramic mountain views.

Pokhara.title: Sarangkot Sunrise Tour
Pokhara.description: Early‑morning tour from Pokhara to Sarangkot for sunrise views over Annapurna and Fewa Lake.

Pokhara.title: Peace Temple
Pokhara.description: Visit the World Peace Pagoda overlooking Fewa Lake and Pokhara valley.

Pokhara.title: Phewa Lake Tal
Pokhara.description: Boating on scenic Phewa Lake with mountain reflections.

Pokhara.title: Begnas Lake
Pokhara.description: Relax by peaceful Begnas Lake, a quieter alternative near Pokhara.

Pokhara.title: Gupteshwor Gupha
Pokhara.description: Explore the sacred Hindu cave temple near Pokhara’s lakeside.

Pokhara.title: Barahi Temple
Pokhara.description: Temple on an island in Phewa Lake, accessed by boat.

Pokhara.title: Tibetan Cultural Tour
Pokhara.description: Visit Tibetan refugee settlements, culture centers and monasteries in Pokhara.

Chitwan.title: Nature Walk in Chitwan Jungle Safari
Chitwan.description: Guided nature and jungle walk inside Chitwan National Park.

Chitwan.title: Jungle Safari Tour
Chitwan.description: Full jungle safari including elephant ride, canoe and jeep.

Chitwan.title: Elephant Breeding Centre
Chitwan.description: Visit the elephant breeding center and learn about conservation efforts.

Chitwan.title: Canoeing in Chitwan National Park
Chitwan.description: Canoe ride on Rapti River spotting wildlife and birds.

Chitwan.title: Tharu Village Tour
Chitwan.description: Cultural tour of Tharu villages near Chitwan National Park.

Bardiya.title: Bardiya National Park Tour
Bardiya.description: Wildlife safari and cultural tours in Bardiya National Park.

Bardiya.title: Full Day Walking Safari at Bardiya National Park
Bardiya.description: Walking safari through Bardiya’s forest for rhino and bird sightings.

Bardiya.title: Full Day Jeep Safari at Bardiya National Park
Bardiya.description: Jeep safari through Bardiya National Park to see wildlife.
